description: We often keep patients in the ICU longer than necessary because transfers to step-down or wards happen late in the day. That blocks beds for new admissions. I want to shift transfers earlier (when possible) so ICU beds free up sooner.

NumberOfPatients.definition: Total number of rows in admissions dataset

NumberOfICUStays.definition: Total number of rows in icustays dataset

NumberOfTransfers.definition: Total number of rows in transfers dataset

ICULengthOfStay.definition: Length of stay in ICU for each admission
